description.text: Service Pack 4 for Microsoft SQL Server 2008 upgraded all Microsoft SQL Server 2008 instances and components installed through the SQL Server setup.  Service Pack 4 can upgrade all editions of Microsoft SQL Server 2008 to Service Pack 4 level. For customers in need of additional installation options, please visit the Microsoft Download Center and download the Service Pack 4 Microsoft SQL Server 2008. To learn more about Microsoft SQL Server 2008 SP4 please visit the Microsoft Support (http://support.microsoft.com) Knowledge Base article KB 2979596.
